$gameDvLyon.writeFile("Jenny", "I shouldn't have said that.
I shouldn't have said that.
I shouldn't have said that.
I shouldn't have said that.
I
shouldn't
have
said
that.

What's wrong with me?")
My gosh, it's been so long and... well, I'd hug you but I'm
I guess that doesn't really matter now but it might be good
to hold off for now. And here's your necklace.
Anyway, it's great to see you again. Are you okay?
I'm fine. Bit sticky. Might need a shower.
Well this was disgusting. Good thing we don't have to
breathe or we'd have drowned in that thing.
So... how'd you get eaten in the first place?
I kind of spawned right next to it and it was... well, it
seemed like it hadn't been fed in a while and I was
just the right size for lunch.
But now everything's... better. Sort of. Why are we back
in Wireland? Are all the subscribers back??
Nope. SOMEONE screwed up and brought back...
So sorry I wanted to save my home from crumbling.
What does this have to do with me?
It doesn't. You and Cliff were brought here by mistake.
It'd take a while to explain.
Like I said, someone screwed up.
You know, it's common courtesy that when someone
acknowledges they've made a mistake and sincerely
apologizes, you kind of stop rubbing it in their face.
Still, even if it was a mishap, it's so good to see you
again. We should find Cliff and then get you and Billy
Really?? Aww, man, and here I'd thought I'd be taking
my shower when I got back home.
Doesn't hurt to take two. Lead the way, I guess!
It's a bush! I... don't really have anything else to say
It's a bush! I... don't really have anything else to say
It's a bush! I... don't really have anything else to say
It's a bush! I... don't really have anything else to say
Y'know, this locket looks really familiar.
You don't think Jenny would have...
Only one way to find out.
Hey! Hey, you big glob of goo!!
Uhh... n-nice slime!! I'm... going to back away!
I'd better see if there's a way to free Billy. And probably
Jenny too, if she's in there!
Don't worry, you guys! I've... got this!
...I can barely make out Billy scowling. Aside from the
surprise of getting eaten, he... seems perfectly alright.
Innocuous too. Good. Nothing dangerous. Except maybe
that King Slime over there but don't get too close to him
It might be a result of the glitching.
Let's just look around, see if we can find Jenny or Cliff
or anything that indicates where they've been.
Okay. Well we're not far from your apartment, so if
they're anywhere, they're probably around here.
Something feels off. I should check everything.
This seems to lead to another game. But I think the only
way I can free Billy and Jenny is probably in this one.
Meaning I should look around more.
I'm not going back on the train!
No need to go back to the train.
Feckin' FINALLY. Where WERE you when I needed you??
I think I'll just leave this here.
I think I'll just leave this here.
I think I'll just leave this here.
I think I'll just leave this here.
I think I'll just leave this here.
I think I'll just leave this here.
Nice, someone put fan art here!
Nice, someone put fan art here!
Puddle slimes. Just... sitting there. Thrilling.
I've always thought the puddle slimes were so cute! And
Yeah, I like that they just sit there. Not exploding. Or
beating you up for coming near them.
Yeah, I guess you would find it boring, wouldn't you?
Not ALL the time. But yeah. A spikefall is more exciting
than watching water slimes float around.
Well their plorts are worth something.
Ugh. This game is so weird.
Aww, cute little puddle slimes! Easiest to feed, too.
